price: Then an earthquake seized them, and they fell lifeless in their homes.
arabic: فَأَخَذَتۡهُمُ ٱلرَّجۡفَةُ فَأَصۡبَحُواْ فِي دَارِهِمۡ جَٰثِمِينَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
